title: Journalist Documents The Many 'Trials Of Oscar Pistorius'
teaser: Oscar Pistorius stunned the world when he ran on prosthetic legs in the 2012 Olympics, then shot his girlfriend dead months later. NPR's Scott Simon asks John Carlin about his new book on the athlete.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
